themes: Need for direct engagement by city officials with the visual arts community
Importance of understanding the diversity and complexity of local art
Distinction between art as culture versus art as entertainment
Value of a thriving, inclusive art ecosystem
key_phrases: should actually attend visual arts events, openings and exhibitions in person
learn more about the complexity and diversity of visual art in Austin
get to know the community face to face
have an informed and invested interest in what they need on their own terms
Attracting tourism is not in the same arena as really great or cutting edge art
barriers_identified: Lack of direct engagement by city officials with the arts community
Overemphasis on tourism rather than authentic cultural development
solutions_proposed: City officials should attend visual arts events, openings, and exhibitions in person
Develop a more informed, invested interest in the needs of artists on their own terms
Recognize and support the full expanse and diversity of the local art ecosystem
